decks.notes: The main focus of this deck is to quickly fill up the graveyard with powerful creatures like Archon of Cruelty and Atraxa, Grand Unifier, and then bring them back to the battlefield using cards like Reanimate and Animate Dead. This reanimation strategy is supported by counter spells like Force of Will and disruption spells like Thoughtseize to protect the combo. The deck also includes cards like Daze and Wasteland to disrupt the opponent's game plan, while drawing cards and filtering with Ponder and Brainstorm to find key pieces of the combo.

This Eldrazi Aggro deck focuses on deploying powerful Eldrazi creatures quickly and disrupting the opponent's game plan with cards like Chalice of the Void and Thought-Knot Seer. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with big creatures like It That Heralds the End and Devourer of Destiny while also utilizing lands like Ancient Tomb and Eye of Ugin to ramp up mana production. With a mix of disruption, acceleration, and threats, this deck looks to put pressure on the opponent and secure a quick victory in Legacy 1 vs 1 matches.

This deck aims to control the game by using counterspells, removal spells, and card advantage to outlast the opponent. The key strategy revolves around casting Standstill to slow down the game and draw cards while disrupting the opponent's plans with removal and counterspells. The deck also utilizes powerful planeswalkers like Jace, the Mind Sculptor and Teferi, Time Raveler to further control the board. With a mix of utility lands and a flexible mana base, the deck can easily adapt to different situations and outmaneuver the opponent.

The main concept of this deck is to use powerful artifacts like Mystic Forge and Karn, the Great Creator to generate a lot of value and combos. The deck contains a lot of mana ramp and key artifacts like Basalt Monolith, Grim Monolith, and Voltaic Key to create infinite mana loops. The deck also includes disruption cards like Pithing Needle and Soul-Guide Lantern to control the opponent's board. The goal is to assemble the right pieces and go off with combos to overwhelm the opponent and win the game quickly.

The deck focuses on utilizing aggressive creatures like Skyclave Apparition and Stoneforge Mystic to disrupt the opponent's game plan while also using cards like Flickerwisp and Recruiter of the Guard for additional utility. It aims to control the board with removal spells like Swords to Plowshares and Solitude, all while utilizing Aether Vial to cheat creatures into play quickly. The deck also includes a toolbox of creatures that can be searched up with Recruiter of the Guard, providing flexibility in dealing with various threats. Additionally, the deck includes a mix of disruption with cards like Containment Priest and Giver of Runes to protect key pieces.
